Cleaning Point
■Check the trash can in the
tray bin and compress or
empty it if needed.

Cleaning Point
■Pick up any rubbish that
you see on the ground. Sweep
dust and small debris with
a broom and dustpan.

Cleaning Point
■Clean up any food spills.

Cleaning Point
■Put the garbage into the
dumpster.

Cleaning Point
■Shovel the snow if there
is any.
